original: 吳郡吳縣人，東吳官員，陸抗之子。陸抗逝世後，諸子分領其軍，繼續與晉朝相抗。晉滅吳時陸晏、陸景皆力戰而死。
text: A native of Wu County, Wu County, an official of Soochow Wu, the son of Lu Kang. After the death of Lu Kang, the scholars led his army and continued to fight against the Jin Dynasty. When the Jin Dynasty defeated Wu, Lu Yan and Lu Jing both died in battle.
